text:
Hey everyone,

Is it possible to add a search feature to a blog template that can search from multiple blogs? My Google search does not return anything meaningful.

Thanks in advance.
Yes you can search specific urls
Any related docs? We are about to use multiple blogs as categories in our company. I also want to ask about the idea of creating multiple blogs as categories? How do you guys think about that?
Look for the HubSpot search API
i.e. create multiple blogs and then pull them into the same template?

Hey :wave: for those who are attending INBOUND, is just me or there is not a lot of Developers sessions during the event? Or maybe I don't look at the right agenda? Thanks cc <@U2H3TT8F2> <@U7SL518D6> <@UV7HW8GQ2> <@U22PKFRU5>

INBOUND itself this year does not have a lot of developer content. Prior to COVID-19 shifting plans around, a larger developer presence was intended.

There is still developer content happening outside of the INBOUND experience itself. Stay tuned for more details. I will link to some posts we have already put out regarding this.
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CCGU4R4ER/p1598988021002200>
was wondering the same thing, didn’t know about dev day 2020, thanks for the note

More announcements and information is to come soon regarding the developer content.

Fortunately because there is no in-person developer content, no one needs worry about flights, and lodging.
Thanks. Is there an official channel to subscribe to where developer content will be announced?
<#CCGU4R4ER|extend>

Since our <#C019VT42R8X|workflows> channel is relatively new, i wanted to x-post this into here to see if anyone may be working on some cool things in relation to this: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C019VT42R8X/p1600034366021300>
Is anyone having issues reaching the listing page for Workflows?   <https://status.HubSpot.com/> says everything is operational but the list of workflows won't load.
Anyone else not seeing workflows loading?
I just spoke to HS support who said workflows are currently down
Thank you <@USJLWLC2V>
Hey Everyone, we are aware of the issues in workflows not loading currently and are working on this now. We’ll keep you updated in the <#CEQQ9NFK2|releases-and-updates> channel when this is resolved.
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CEQQ9NFK2/p1600115445030900>

Hi, is anyone aware of a way of getting back a contact’s properties from the vid (as an identifier) being passed as a query string in the request?

I’ve built something to use the Contacts API but concerned of how I can run the variable conditions I have against if/else’s in HubL and being able to localise it (issue in setting a var in hubL from ajax response).

I feel like I’m making it more difficult than it needs to be but trying to build something that if a HubSpot cookie doesn’t exist but a vid exists in the query string I can have a fall back to look for a contact and provide the experience of a recognised contact.
Hey guys Im sort of new to this so I was wondering what would be the best alternative to using ajax for submitting a form for HubSpot cms?
Using a form embed
